content.detailedDescription:
On the night of saturday july 3, 2010. i saw a weird object in the sky that appeared right over onarga, illinois. it looked like an orange fire ball or disk shaped object.

 i have never seen anything before in my life. it appeared out of no where and was heading toward the north north east during the time. it was not losing altitude and was not going out so it couldn't of been a firework. it was traveling very fast at very high speeds but not enough to create a sonic boom. i know for a fact that this was no aircraft cause i have never seen an aircraft like that before.
content.summary: It looked like an orange fireball or disk shaped object..

content.detailedDescription:
I went out on the deck to smoke a cigarette, when i looked in the sky and saw a bright red fireball with a bright white circular light in front of the fireball, moving very slowly south to north. i called to my husband to come quickly outside to see it.  he came outside seeing the fireball and walked across the street toward the park, keeping his eyes on now 2 fireballs (side by side) and i was stationary on the deck watching the these fireballs.  he now said there were 3 fireballs in a triangle (i did not see 3 - trees were in my way on the deck).  he said they looked like road flare tips.  he stayed in the park for about a minute or so watching until they faded out - going north.

i wasn't sure what i was seeing - fireworks maybe?  but it was moving very slowly horizontally - not going upward like a firework.  my husband at first thought it was a flare, but it wasn't going up.  we both thought this was a strange sight to see.
content.summary: One bright fireball moving slowly south to north, joined by 2 more, forming a triangle.

content.detailedDescription: After watching a fireworks display in brockway, pa on july 3rd; myself and 6 family members were sitting on a porch deck.  a relative said - look, a ufo. we looked and noticed an orange light moving through the sky from west to east slowly. it moved in a straight line, but slower than an airplane which made us keep watching it.  it was mentioned that we should get binoculars, but thought it was now too far away.  we watched it move at the same speed in a straight line for about 2 minutes and then it seemed to fade and disappear in the distance.  i thought perhaps in the smoke from the fireworks.  approximately 5 minutes later i was walking to my car and my relative said there it is again.  he got binoculars from his vehicle and then handed them to me.  it took me about 15 seconds to get the light focused.  when focused i saw 5 orange lights in a pentagon pattern.  at first, i said the lights were in a star pattern.  my cousin noted that it seemed to ne zig-zagging.  after about 45 seconds the lights again faded.  we continued to watch the sky , but the light did not reappear.
content.summary: After watching fireworks saw an orange light moving slowly from west to east, 3 minutes later reappearred northeast to southeast.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my younger brother were watching our campfire at about 10 pm, my friend just left and it was me and him, soon as i looked up to the stars since it was a very clear night, i saw an orange object that looked to be a triangle or disc it moved so fast i could not tell, this moved at least 4x faster than any plane that goes by here, which we have a lot, this object did not blink and was one solid color which somewhat pulsated which was this orange glow. it did multiple maneuvers and when i tried to get a better look it was already gone, it lasted about 20 or so seconds, maybe less. whatever it was it wasn't a plane, these go by all the time and they never could move that fast and do so many maneuvers, this thing was able to do a figure 8 then move away so fast it was incredible, it seemed like it came out of nowhere too.
content.summary: A fast flying orange glowing triangle.

content.detailedDescription: I'm visiting my sister in maryland , i went out on the back deck for a smoke at 10:45 . and happened to glance up at the sky . coming across and traveling south-southeast , was a square object with white lights in each corner and a flashing red strobe in the center . the height of the object was around 2,000 feet , moving slow and emitting no sound . there was no other air traffic in the sky , and it was a quite night . even with the aircraft that passes overhead you can here the motors or the jet engines at almost any altitude . i had the object in view for about 2 minutes till i lost it behind some trees . at that height the object looked to be about an inch square or a little bigger when it was closer to me . sure would like to know if anyone else saw this object . i did try to take a pic of it with my cell phone but all i got from the viewer was grey .
content.summary: Square object with lights in the corners.

content.detailedDescription:
I was in my garden at my home address, i had only recently returned from the pub where i watched the england vs germany world cup game. i came home early because england lost.
so, i was in my garden having a cigarette. i had been outside for a couple of minuets and i was walking back up some steps which lead to my front door, and as i walked up the steps i noticed the ufo in the sky.
it was a triangle formation of circles, which stayed the exact same distance apart from each other as they moved across the sky. the circles where burning intensely, like three suns. the best way i could describe their colour would be to say they where 'fiery' - again, like a sun. they flew across the sky at considerable speed.
my instant reaction was that it was a ufo of some kind, i instantly ruled out the possibility of it an aeroplane. i considered that it might be comets, but it seemed unlikely to me.
i watched them for maybe ten seconds before i took my phone out of my pocket and started filming them. (my phone is a nokia 5800 xpress music, with a carl zeiss, tessar 2.8/3.7, 3.2 megapixel /af camera)
i followed their movements and also zoomed in (which is what the clicking sound is on the video).
they flew from my left to my right, and as they flew to the right i could tell they was also flying further away, into the distance.
as they got further away, the furthest right of the three circles started to dim and then disappear from sight, the middle and left circle followed suit as they got further away.
if there is any other information that you think is necessary or relevant, i would be happy to provide you with it.
content.summary: Ufo triangle formation flew across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
i was just returning to my apartment from an evening walk, and as i neared my apartment, a passenger jet left kent county airport and i watched as it passed by overhead, as i've always had an interest in planes. my eye caught an object that seemed to be silently, slowly floating in the sl breeze, from about the one o'clock position.The sky was clear blue and i could not determine how high or large it was, as there was no reference point. i had immediately thought of large pieces of ash in the sky after a large fire in grand rapids, a few years ago. but this had an angular shape. as i watched it, i tried to decide what it was. i could tell it was triangular, had no wings, did not roll in the sky or turn or wobble. it looked like a burnished mottled, black as the sun hit the right side, to the west, and the center left side was black, like the it had a ridge or keel in the middle that shaded the east(left)half of the bottom. the pointed end was directed away from me, and the object moved in a direction 45 degrees to it's alignment. the rear end did not seem flat or rectangular. the best description of it, was that it looked like a broadhead, hunting arrow tip. 
  i probably wouldn't have thought a lot about it, except as i was about to turn away and continue inside, the object suddenly shot out of sight past  some tall trees to the east of me. it didn't just disappear, it was like shot out of a gun in the direction it had been pointed, not in the direction it had coasted by, probably directly over the airport. 
  i was sorry after wards that i didn't take a pic of the object with my phones camera, but although i could not id it after careful observation, it didn't seem significant, until it shot out of sight. that made a real impression. i did make a sketch of it immediately and checked wood-tv's website for the wind direction/speed at the time. supposedly 10 mph from nw which was perpendicular to the object's drift, as it was passing slowly to the ne.. i did not include the sketch, but could if someone wished one..
content.summary: A dark triangular shape drifted across the sky above, then shot out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were watching t.V. when i looked out our 3rd floor apartment window and spotted a red ball of light approaching from the west.  it moved slowly, then stopped in midair.  at that point, i went out onto the balcony to watch and i called my husband to come take a look.  he grabbed a small pair of binoculars and then we saw another red ball of light from the same direction approaching slowly, rising from behind the distant tree line.  it moved next to the ball of light and stopped in midair also.  i then saw a third red ball of light approaching from the same direction moving slowly.  it moved in line with the other two balls, forming a straight line.  then the furthest ball to the left, moved to the top of the other two balls to form a triangle shape with the one ball on top and the other two underneath.  the bottom right ball then moved up to join the top ball, as did the other bottom red ball.  they formed a straight line again and then started to move away after what seemed like only a minute.  the lights suddenly dimmed until we couldn't see them any more, as if they just vanished.  we looked at each other in astonishment and tried to conclude every reasonable explanation until we couldn't come up with one.
content.summary: Three red balls of light that formed a straight line, then triangular shape.

content.detailedDescription: I don't know why i'm doing this...I promised myself not to do it but i have read of so many people that have experienced this phenomena that i feel that i must do it....July 4th 2009: this year macy's is going to show off with fireworks on the west side of the hudson river...As i live in in a building that faces up the skyline of new york city i have invited some friends to come over for a party so they can see the fireworks. it's 7:45 am not later than 8:10 when i wake up to clean my apartment for the party. i slide the curtain to the sides so i can start cleaning the windows when i suddenly see this object just above the city of hoboken....At first i thought it was a ballon and from my point of view it looked like a diamond shaped object...I ran to get my binoculars and called my roommate so he can witnessed for himself(by that time he didn't believe in ufo's) i was in shocked when i see this : a triangle shaped object, moving clockwise, on every tip it had like a hole, the edges were off rounded, dull gray color. i would estimate that the size of this airship was the same like a helicopter to a small plane...Hard to tell..I observed for about 10 mins and it moved in a straight line through the city until i lost the sight of it...It had some kind of mist of heat wave around it , if i can call it that way...The most weird thing is nobody reported it this and it was early in the morning...No newspaper, no tv,etc...There were some comercial planes by the time of the sighting in the area....I must say that last year there were plenty activity of ufos in the ny city area...Spheres coming out from clouds, shadowed ships that fly at speed light,,,orbs coming out from ground zero,etc....I had another sighting with another of this ships a couple of months later...Please look up the sky, something is happening in our backyard and the sad thing  is we don't even realize that is happening here....In our backyard....
content.summary: Triangle shaped airships do exist.

content.detailedDescription:
I've not come forward before, but the poor people who lost their dog fleeing this thing is just too close to what i saw on the evening of june 9th at 9:30pm as i turned off of stony point road onto pepper road.

as i turned onto pepper road, i noticed an object hovering motionless in the sky to my left and two or three pastures in front of me.  it looked about the size of a helicopter and was fairly high up at the altitude that one would expect to see a helicopter flying, but it had no flashing lights and no red or green.  it looked like a close collection of three bright whitish-orange lights just hovering.  i've seen strange lights driving through there before, so i had the thought 'well, if you're a ufo, then flash.'  immediately after thinking that thought, the object descended at rapid speed directly towards me.  needless to say, i was quite startled by its approach.  it went from looking like a collection of lights, to looking like a translucent enormous wing with a bright light on each end.  the closer it got, the wider apart the lights became, although the lights stayed connected in relation to one another, as if on the tips of a straight wing.  as it got to about tall tree level over pepper road, it banked hard like a conventional plane would do, but at a rate that no plane could do.  it turned over the trees and cattle ranch at the intersection of jewett and pepper roads and moved west.  as it turned and departed, i could see the lights against the western sky which was still a deep turquoise after sunset.  if it had been a conventional aircraft, i would've seen it silhouetted against the lighter sky and i would have heard engines.  i heard nothing, and at best i saw something translucent between the two lights, as if it was an enormous wing.  when it banked, it was three times the size of the rancher's house and was very low in the sky.  if that rancher had been looking out his window, he would've had the same experience as the family in the 03july2010 event id 24103 had.  he would've thought an enormous craft with two bright lights on it was going to hit his house.  i sped up to follow the craft, but a two-decker several axle livestock truck was lumbering through the intersection of jewett and pepper road, so i had to stop and wait for it.  by the time i got to the west side of the rancher's house and out to open pasture again, i could see no sign of the object.  

i'm not a nut.  i'm a phd scientist and i know that i saw something incredible.  a friend has suggested that i saw lights reflecting in my windshield,  but pepper road is dark.  there are no lights to reflect.  no cars were behind me or to the side of me.  the only vehicle nearby was the livestock truck that was perpendicular to me and far ahead of me when the event occurred.
content.summary: Petaluma ranchlands:  enormous translucent wing with two lights on each end low over house.

content.detailedDescription: I was coming out of my garden shed and i saw my wife looked up at the sky out of the kitchen window. i looked up to see what she was looking at and i saw an orange sphere coming from the west  it was very low about 80 feet above me. it made no sound and its surface looked like molten metal, it was moving slowly and i took a photo with my phone. the flash on my phone went off and the ufo slowed nearly stopping as if it had seen me. it then moved very slowly to the south and just vanished.
content.summary: Orange sphere moving slowly over head.

content.detailedDescription:
My son-inlaw and i were on the front porch talking and watching the neighbor's down the street and west of our house shooting off some fireworks. i saw from the corner of my eye a bright orange light ball that i briefly thought was another firework but it was moving slowly and appeared to get larger and closer. i watched it for a moment then asked my son-inlaw to look at it. he looked and said "what the hell!" we just stared at it in awe. we were stunned both of us thinking this can't be a ufo. maybe a flare, but it wasn't hovering and smoking like one. it was moving from the west to east very slowly and silently. not a meteor because it wasn't coming down from the sky, no flame or smoke trail and was moving too slow. as it got closer like the size of a streetlight or maybe a little smaller than a basketball at arms length, we could tell it was glowing like it was on fire, no flames but burning like the sun surface. i started yelling inside of the house for my husband and 30yr old son to hurry and come outside fast. the object then took a turn and headed southeast picking up speed. by the time my son got outside it was a little smaller than a baseball at arms length before a tree blocked his veiw. he tried to run down the street to see it but it was already gone.
i went in to watch the 10 o'clock news, sure that someone else had seen it. nothing. neither did it show up in the paper or morning news. someone else had to have saw something that big in the sky on fire. but i haven't heard anything. i hate to be the first one to report it because i'm not good at est. how many miles it was away or how big it is but maybe everyone is like me waiting for someone else to report it so they can say "yea, i saw it too."
content.summary: Large orange sphere shaped object appeared to be on fire like the sun but no flames coming off of it or smoke trail, silently moving slowly from west to east then accelerates, turns southeast, dissapears.. absolutely not a plane!

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were headed west bound from kendaville indiana on us 6 at 10:00 pm on june 26 2010.I had just looked at the time on the radio. when we were 2 mile east of state rd 9 north i noticed 3 lights travling east on the south side of us 6 in a row aproxamently 100 to 200 yards apart.I would say flying at a height of what the samartin helocopters fly in our state.I pointed them out to my wife my reaction was *(words deleted--sgonzalez/cms)! i slowed the car.They made a slight arch in there movment or a s flight movment as they proceded we talked as we watched when we reached the point where they were straight south of us the last object in the row made a 90 degree right angle and sped south at a high rated of speed out of sight.The second object then made a 45 degree right hand turn leaving the formation at a slower rate of speed yet much faster than i have ever seen any aircraft fly.We could see it at a great distance the first object continued eastward and we lost sight as we traveled westward.The light that they cased was a bright white,no blinking or shimmering.The sun at that time was over the horizon and our head lights had come on.I have seen pictures of orbs and this i belive were not of that.In 1990 i witnessed a simular sighting of one of the same some 8 miles away.Nothing of this world that i have seen can make a 90 degree turn and travel at the speed i have seen these objects travel.My wife has never been a beliver this sighting scared her to the point of shaking and now agrees what we seen could not of been of our world.There was alot of trafic east and west bound that night im sure that we were not the only one that could have seen the 3 brightly lit objects hopefully some one else will come forward.When we got home i posted it on my face page and i recived a hit on it from a friend who lives in kendaville.She and her husband watched a single light.
content.summary: 3 round shaped objects in a row then broke flight pattern and separated.

content.detailedDescription:
Im not sure how long it lasted because we thought we were going to die but you will understand in this description. it felts like minutes but i know it was seconds because we really thought we were going to die! here is the story:
 i am reporting this in sadness because of this event my dog died! my daughter went to get the dogs from outside to bring them in (she's 15) and she ran screaming "get out a plane is going to hit us" "run" and she was hysterical. me my husband and my son and i went running downstairs and my husband went to the backdoor (running) to investigate because my daughter is very meek and quiet and never screams. the next thing i know my husband is yelling "run" "its gonna hit us" and he started praying to god that we lived and if not take us to heaven and let it be quick. we ran straight out the door as fast as our legs would go. myself and my son never heard or saw anything we were just running for dear life. my husband told us to stop behind the trees because he thought at any moment it would hit and we wouldnt get much father ( didnt atually even think we would make it out the front door) and we live in the country so its all mostly open space in front of us. when nothing happened after a few seconds he told us to keep running as i horrifyingly saw him turn back toward the house. we kept going hurrying down the road and as we went we were trying to call our dogs that had escaped with us. my husband returned in his truck to state the object simply was gone/vanished he had no idea where it went but it never hit our house or flew over us and not a single sound was heard. so we continued the search for our dogs however one was struck by a car and killed. later when i spoke with my husband and daughter i was informed it had 2 bright lights and was up in the sky they could see the back neighbors house below it and it made no sound and teetered a little back and forth but the lights were always horizontal to eachother. this object made no sound what so ever and my husband said he saw the silhouette and it was as big as our back pasture across and very dark. i am very saddened but wanted to report this because weird things have occurred before here that we never mentioned to people. like for one instance our laser pointer lights (we would play with our dogs with) when we would point them in the field they would disappear at some points but would be seen all the way to the orchards at other points and we always laughed that it was like something invisible was sucking up the light at that spot. im now truely scared and wanted this reported in the case something happens to us. now it is time for me to grieve. i am afraid to sleep. i truly believe it must have landed in our pasture but everything appears normal. something very wrong happened here tonight...Please help!! has anyone else ever experienced this?
content.summary: 2 bright lights huge object no sound thought we were going to die.

content.detailedDescription: While standing in a friends front yard i noticed movement and looked to see a single object darting above the trees.  the object glowing blue would dart in all directions then hover motionless and slowly turn to a single bright red dot of light. from my experience in the army airborne i estimated the altitude to go between 1200 and 1800 ft very rapidly. the object would drift or decend at various speed below the tree tops. i have additional photos other than the ones i presented..Notice the stars in the back ground..Photos were taken with a hand held dimyage e 500 konica minolta.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Boomerang shape, brightly lit dark blue at center lightening to translucient at edges then dimming to a single bright red light.

content.detailedDescription:
I went outside of my house as i do most nights to survey the night sky as i usually do in good weather.  i look for anything moving such as meteors, comets, etc.... hoping to see a ufo someday.
     as i looked up, i saw at about one third of the distance toward the eastern horizen, a very dim object that i thought was a satellite, moving very fast from north to south and veer off to the east before disappearing from view.  this took about 3 to 4 seconds.  there  was no trail so it could not have been a meteor.  i have seen plenty of meteors and i know this was not one.  it wasn't a bird. it moved to fast.  i would say it had to be moving at about 2,500 to 3,000 mph.  this is just a guess.  it also was not a jet plane.  i was in the naval air arm and i would know if this was a jet plane.  no noise, no jet trail, moving very fast.  i think i finally saw a ufo.
     my feelings were: what the heck....And i stood there looking for something more...And there was nothing more.  i kept looking up for about three more minutes and saw nothing more. it was like a complete letdown.  i then went inside to tell my wife what i just saw.  i thought about what i just saw and then thought about getting in touch with stanton friedman.  after a while, my wife went on the internet and brought up his site.  it referred me to your mufon site.
*wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms.
content.summary: A dim satellite looking object moved across the sky, north to south and veered east before disappearing from sight.

content.detailedDescription: My wife an i were in the park.  it was strting to get dark and we were about to pack up and go.   i decided to take some random pictures of the sky.   i didn't see the object untill i looked at the pictures on the computer.  the direction i was facing was north west     i'm kinda the skeptic but my wife is the one who insistis that i send this in and i agree.  it may be nothing  but here it is anyway.
content.summary: Cigar shaped craft fuzzy white with dark area in middle.

content.detailedDescription: It started the night on july 1st , 2010. me and my girlfriend were driving down vandyke rd. heading back to my house when i seen this really bright shiny like star in the sky. it was very weird to me because it was out and bright before any of the stars are usually visible. at first my girlfriend "who was pretty skeptical at first" tried to convince me it was a helicopter or an airplane. we stopped driving and noticed it was moving in a slow and different way then any airplane or helicopter ive ever seen has. it would sit still in the sky flashing on and off, sometimes glowing a faint pigment of red or green, and if you concentrated there were blatant light sources emitting from this object. when we got home i rushed outside to check it out. during this time i was amazed to see how clear and vivid this object was. it was not like anything i have ever seen in my entire life. this unknown object the first night was tricking with my mind because of the way it would sit still in the sky for 15-20 minute periods at a time. it was also very low in comparison to a airplane etc. then it would move in really unpredictable ways, up and down, left and right, sometimes it would even move up and down almost like the tower does in toronto, canada. the object flashed on and off sometimes more then others for the entire sighting. when i seen it the first night i was really excited and in complete aw. i have never witnessed anything like this. the first night my girlfriend, myself, and my mother both seen the object. i went online and checked out the sightings in cleveland, ohio, and to my surprise it was almost the same exact shape and behavior as the sighting in the video. i then knew this was not something to ignore. the video from the sightings in cleveland said the ufo had been seen ten nights in a row, so on july 2nd, 2010, i had the urge to look for it again. once again before any other stars were out. in the same direction as before, was this very bright, glowing object. this time i knew something was not normal about this thing. i watched it again when i got back home and to my surprise this time it seemed much closer then before. it was really high at first, and towards the end of the sighting it disappeared in the horizon or landed it was hard to tell really. this time unlike the night before, i had called my father who knows a lot about astronomy, him and my step mother drove over and so did my sister and others. about twelve of us stood outside and all agreed this object was a phenomenon. there was much more activity then the night before. the object moved a lot more then the previous night, and its movements were more random and inhumane. when watching this object, you could almost make out little small moving lights, moving around the object in weird patterns, like they were attached to it. also when the object moved and flashed, it was very obvious that it was not that high in the sky, it was much much more lower then commercial airplanes, i would say it was mainly about the height as personal "small" airplanes usually fly. the object flashed a bunch and started to lower in the horizon almost as if it were hovering above the tress and getting lower. it is now 1:00am july 3rd, and the object has been out of sight since 11:30 eastern time. while me and my friends and family watched this object, we were convinced that someone else had to have seen it. if anyone else reports this same sighting, i would not be surprised, it was very clear, noticeable, and obvious. i plan on looking in the skies tonight and tomorrow, since its been two nights in a row now. if possible, have someone look tomorrow, i have a strong feeling it will be there again. anyways if you feel i have left out any important details you can feel free to contact me by phone or email.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White blinking object, almost identical to the recent sightings in cleveland, ohio.

content.detailedDescription:
On a way to a store i've remembered i've forgotten to take my camera so i hurried to get home with some shopping , put it down without taking anything out & i just took the camera in my hand & went to photograph the sky as i felt the light ships are in the sky.
well i couldn't see them with the naked eyes so i've concentrated & aimed the at specific parts of the sky , way high ! once i've put them in iphoto & zoomed in bit by bit , there they were & so many :-) my first few photos were directly in the w direction of the international airport with the beautiful sunset backdrop . than towards sw , few in midway of es & last one nearly above my head at 90* horizon level & perhaps 5-10* towards w & that's where most ships were ! they must have been at extreme hight as even in the zoomed in photographs they're tiny round lights. in 1 of the photos facing the airport once zoomed in i could clearly see an outline of a black military jet (it's in the 1/3 bottom part of the, yet some of the lights seemed to be at the bottom left side but most are in the top part in that particular photo , i chuckled at seeing that. 
the sequence of the photos taken & the areas it seems they were on a path from wn to w to ws to s (most likely into the us).
too bad i cannot submit more than 3 photos with this report , lol ! 
however , all the photographs are for mufon's disposal if you wish , just let me know :-]
to the #5 question , well i almost didn't take a photo of where most of them actually were but this nagging thought came repeating itself "take the photo anyway" at the same time i felt joy , so i'm glad i didn't disregard the intuition .
content.summary: Large flotilla at sunset , zoomed-in photos included.

content.detailedDescription: Every night iam outside and i swear iam in a fly-way. ive seen alot of aircraft and these are not aircraft as most people see them. they are to fast and to high. my freinds have come over and seen them and they are now certain that iam not nuts. it is truely something to behold. the fly-overs happen all the time although some nights thry are not there. simply put they are to dam fast for any aircraft we have and to dam high. one night we had a low one that made no noise and had one bright light in the middle of it and a ring of like fog all around it. wish i had pictures but was to occupied with the dam thing to even think of that. this is an on-going event that seems to have no end. most of the time they blink out after a minute or two, or right after they make a 90 degree turn or shoot straight up. wish i had an infra red camera.
content.summary: Fly overs.

content.detailedDescription:
First, a little background info on me -- i'm a medium/paranormal investigator and so i am very sensitive to things occuring.  it was about 9:20 - 9:25 pm edt on friday, 7/2/2010. i was working at my computer (with my back to the window). the blinds were up and i felt that feeling like someone was watching you, so i got up and went to close the blinds. as i did this, through the slats of the blinds, and coming in our direction (towards the house) was a bright red light. now it looked triangular to me initially but that is because i was working on the computer and my eyes were tired tonight; i had a little blurry/double-vision going on which made the line of lights into two sets of lines. i estimated this array of lights to be about 1,500 - 2,000 feet above ground level. there is a thin combination of stratus and some low cloud cover and this thing was sort of moving quietly through the cloud deck. (if it was way up in the cirros-stratus cloud layer, it would have to have been going very fast; therefore, i believe it was much lower.)

at first, i said to myself, "oh, it's probably a fireworks display." (you know... when the rockets go up and then burst into all the sparklers, you get burning red embers coming down from the sky.) this was different however -- it was tracking like a helicopter hovering in our direction. there was no sound of any prop or jet enging or chopper blades. off in the distance i heard fireworks going off. but right above in our local sky, all was silent except for this thing as it headed in our direction. dad was resting in the room and mom was watching tv. the front door was locked so when i realized it may have been a ufo event, i ran to the front door, opened it and stood on the front steps and looked up at it. at this point it was in the sky over our general street area (but apparently higher up now) and it made a 90 degree turn to the right and was beginning to head out over the bay towards the ocean. i called out to mom and told her i believed we had a ufo and she came outside and also witnessed it. we watched it slowly tracking to the southeast towards the beach. i ran inside and got my olympus c2100 digital camera, hoping to capture a picture before it was gone. i took two photos. the first photo (although not zoomed in) caught the object and it's light display. the second photo i tried hurriedly to zoom in and pressed the shutter button but it was too dark to see where it was in the viewfinder and unfortunately my zoomed in shot missed it out of frame. i have uploaded the pictures to the computer. i kept the original unedited photo but did make a cropped, close-up second copy to show it better. i will post the photo here shortly.

some more comments are in order: first, i am a pilot and this object had no navigation lights (such as red/green and white on the tail.) second, there was no engine sound. mom thought it may have been a blimp type of craft -- but those have turbofan types of motors which are very loud. third, i pondered whether this was one of those laser lights that establishments use to light the sky through the clouds to attract attention to their business or event. however, i feel this was more like a craft flying than someone pointing a large beam of light in the sky and moving it around. it can't be a meteorite either because it made a 90 degree turn and was too long an event to be a burn-up in the atmosphere. fourth, this is my second ufo event on long island (about 20 miles away from the other event). the previous event i witnessed occurred in calverton near the closed military base there. similarly, we live about 12 miles from an airport with a military base. (i actually learned to fly at this airport.) fifth, if i was not seeing double vision and it was indeed triangular, perhaps when it turned towards the ocean, i was looking at only one side of it.

finally, i wanted to say that if this was something special (be it military, otherworldy or even a paranormal/spiritual event) i do feel the timing of my witnessing it was important. another 20-30 seconds not getting up to go to the window, i would not have witnessed it. therefore i feel i was connected to this event. or perhaps i heard them calling me.

photo note: i have the original larger, uncropped unedited photo which is available for analysis if you need it.
content.summary: Hampton bays ufo cigar-shaped red and white lights near airbase.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking my puppies out last night about 10:30 pm and discovered someone had turned off my motion detector porch light.  as i was waving my arm in front of the light not realizing that it was off, i noticed a bright star-like light in the south eastern sky.  it was bigger & brighter than any other stars that i have ever seen and caught my attention for that reason. i live about 20 miles from the city of augusta in the foot hills of the mountains, and so with out any background light this anomoly was very clear and noticeable. when i was watching this bright light, a smaller star like light came from the southern sky, moved right up to the first light, then flew at a very rapid speed off at what seemed like a right angle into the northern sky.  there was no sound other than the normal night sounds. i got very anxious and switched on the porch light, when i turned it back off both star like objects were gone. i hurried the dogs in the house, and several times i checked out of the window facing the same area, but saw nothing more out of the ordinary. it or they were gone. i grew up as an air force brat living on military bases and have never seen any kind of flight  vehicles that could maneuver with such speeds and at such changes in angles, in total silence.

this event happened so quickly i did not have time to even think of photographing it. i always thought these kind of things happened in the big cities, not in rural maine where we only have a couple of buildings with 10 stories.
content.summary: Large star like object with second smaller one moving in -- then off in another direction.

content.detailedDescription: i was headed home after leaving my girlfriends house.At a distnace i noticed what appeared to be a very bright falling star. in a moment i noticed the sky appearing to light up in the distance. suddely i saw that the woods were getting very bright a short distance away. in a moment i realized that everything had gotten bright. the entire area had become like daylight. i looked up above my vehicle and noticed an object hovering . it wasn't spinning but was moving the same speed i was moving. i stucki my head out the window to get a better look and realized that it was not making any sound. at that time it was about it was about 200 feet high. i began to speed up and was followed and the object got lower. after about one-half mile it got down to about 30 feet above my vehicle. the object shinned a very bright light on me which made me unable to see for what seemed like only a short time. as the light went out i was able to see the bones in my hands and arms for a split second. i looked and saw the object hovering beside my vehicle about 3 feet above the ground. in the blink of an eye it went up and out of sight. i went into town and didn't see anyone. i went home and awakened my mother to tell her. she was concerned because it was almost 3 pm. in the morning. the trip from my girlfriends home took about 10 to 12 minutes. i had experienced a loss of time and i also remember experiencing some vomiting after i got home.
content.summary: It was a dull stainless steel color, about 12-15 feet in diameter and was about five feet tall.

content.detailedDescription: I keep trying to rationalize this in my mind. after observing the same area of sky for a while i am still finding that this was not a normal aircraft. i am not good at judging or remembering exact times or days. like most females i can tell you details about the landmarks on a route but don't know the street names or distances for a familiar route. that being said... i was so e time between 8:30ish pm and 11:00 pm on tuesday, june 22. i  went out several times that evening to relax with my kitty. i stepped out onto my porch to call my cat.  as i stood facing west, i noticed a larger than normal and extreamly bright orange flashing light to my left, south.  i walked over to the south of my patio onto the grass to keep sight of it. i watched as the object appeared to decend while traveling north/east. it leveled off and continued heading east. at that point the extreamly bright orange light was alternating with a white light.  it flew lower than the other helicopters in the air that night.  when i was walking to the south of my yard to keep it in sight, i felt an unsettling feeling because it made no noise. as it continued east i lost sight of it since it was flying so low. at about the time that i began to loose sight of it, i noticed a second light traveling roughly the same path. i quickly recognized the second craft as a helicopter. it had different light colors and normal flashing lights as well as being noisey.  it turned to go in the same direction as the orange lighted craft went. the second craft was also flying at the usual height and i also noted that it moved less smoothly than the first craft.  my mind wants to associate the first craft as a helicopter, but the peculiars of the first craft were unlike everything that i normally see. we have a lot of air traftc around our home.  i have always enjoyed gazing at the sky and the clouds, aircraft or stars. i have never ever seen such a bright and very orange light. i searched the web trying to find a type of aircraft that uses an orange light like it, but found nothing as far as legitimate crafts that have such a light. this was bright, larger than normal at durring the evening hours that people are up and about. if anyone else in northern phoenix saw this or knows what it was, please post your description too.  it did not occur to me to get my camera because i was fixed on keeping my eye on the weird light.
content.summary: Bright orange flashing light, then alternating white/orange. low, no noise, slow, followed by helicopter.

content.detailedDescription: Was on my deck, clear sky,i looked in the skt to see if any planes were crossing my view when i saw a shiny flashing object in the air and figured it was a balloon very high in the sky. i watched it and it soon passed a stationary object which was a dull, dim, silver, similar to high flying aircraft, however, it was stationary and very difficult to see. i retrieved the binoculars to get a closer look at both objects, but the shiny object that i assumed was a baloon was not visable any longer. i scanned that area for the dull object and found it with the binoculars. it was bright and silvery and appeared to have wings once infocus with the binoc's. my son and i both watched the stationary object for 30 min before moving on to fishing. i am an avid stargazer and aviation enthusiast. one thing i did find unusual was that the sky was absent of commericial air traffic that i could see. i will sit on my deck and watch the planes with the binoc's, this gives confirmation to my wifes claims that i don't have a life. i saw it at se direction looking straight up and the se at about 70-80 degrees. i tried to record it with my camcorder but that bootleg piece of *(word deleted--sgonzalez/cms) didn't reach out enough. i did not have any remarkable reaction to the object, i was glad that my son saw it as well
content.summary: Silver object.

content.detailedDescription:
In the year 2007 i captured many images of  some kind ( probably the aliens used the similar method to introduce themselves ). they are large images formed by the invisible fog (or mist); and of course, there are always some  spheres or light beam near the project images. most of the images are familiar by people: they are figures of lizards, reptiles, dragonsetc. but some of them are difficult to understand, they are a kind of graphic shape( see the attached pictures). until today i still dont know which alien done all those projection and what are the implications of those graphic images. 
each those images only exist for a couple of seconds then disappear or another shape appears. i believe the aliens are intend to use this kind of projection to communicate with us. the last two frame of pictures in this video are aliens project image too: [links to you tube removed]

please add this attached picture to case 18817 file (long term visitation). more details from: [link removed]
content.summary: Aliens' projected image.

content.detailedDescription:
I was talking on my phone with my buddy about 22:30 the sky was in twilight. 

as we were talking, i noticed this super bright white light traveling slowly through the sky from the northwest. 

it was not a satellite as i have spent stargazing watching them for years.

i thought i might be the landing light of a helicopter, but there was absolutely no noise to be heard. 

my neighbourhood was very quiet at the time. 

i told my buddy to look over my way. he lives about 20 km from me, and he could see it too.

it was traveling along without a sound and not at a speed of a helicopter. 

it made an "s" motion at 1 point, then was moving over szczecin towards my friends place in the southeast. 

it flickered a few times and then it was gone.

there were a few clouds in the sky at the time.

it's been a weird week for ufo events here. 


on a side note- i have also witnessed something very similar to this about 5 years ago in langley b.C. canada.
content.summary: White sphere of light.

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking about in my home and looked west out towards the nice sunset. i live a short distance from the german border. 

i saw a super bright orange light. it was not a flare. it appeared to be coming over from germany. then there were 5-6 more orange spheres appearing out of thin air. there were no clouds in the sky. i thought it was someone who was letting some flaming ball of fire attached to helium balloons. then they started to move towards my home. they seemed to be just drifting in the sky. but they moved closer together then farther apart- just like it was a choreographed event. they lasted for about 5 minutes then faded out. 

then to my surprise, there were another 10 or so of the same objects emerging from the same area and doing the same thing as the previous spheres. 

i was reading "event id 24087"  and i saw the same thing for sure. 

i was observing through my 16x binoculars and didn't make out any certain shape.

the elevation of the spheres would be possibly 300-500 meters agl.

there was no noise emitted from the spheres at the time of viewing. 

there was little to no ambient noise in my location.
content.summary: Many orange glowing spheres.

content.detailedDescription:
I was out at a restaurant on main street in manayunk with some friends.  two of the people i was with were standing just outside of the front windows of the restaurant talking when they noticed something in the sky.  one of my friends started banging on the front glass of the restaurant to grab my attention and told me to come out side quickly.  i missed the beginning of the "light show", but i will address their accounts right after i give my description of what i witnessed.  

when i got outside, i saw four glowing orange orbs in the night sky.  they were pulsing/flickering and were similar in color and action to what a flame would be on a lit candle, but were completely spherical in shape.  the formation that they were in was in two separate pairs of two.  moments after getting outside, the forth orb shrank in size and simply disappeared.  of the three that were left, two still stayed relatively close to each other while the third stayed a bit off to the side.  the two that were close together were moving steadily and slowly away from each other, then closer, then away, then closer and on and on like this for approximately two minutes.  the distance that they moved away and closer to each other was exactly the same every time, it was not random by any means.  just after this the third orb shrank in size until merely disappearing like the forth.  the two that were left stayed equal distance from each other and simply just sat in the sky for a few more minutes.  while this was happening other people in the street were also watching and some were coming over to us and saying, "oh my god, do you see that? ...What the hell could that be?" and other comments of the sort.  then what happened to the forth and the third orb happened with the second.  it shrank in size and disappeared.  the about a minute later the same happened with the last orb and they were all gone.  i tried to take a few pictures with my cell phone but there was too much ambient light from the restaurants, shops and streetlights.  nothing showed up.  after it was done, still more people were approaching us with the same response, "...Oh my god did you see that?", "that was awesome!", ...Oh my god, what the hell was that?".

the accounts of my two friends that were outside first, said that when they first saw the sight the orbs they seemed to be "dancing with each other".  they said that they were still divided in two groups of two.  each pair was following a criss-cross flight pattern of their own; they were not synchronized with the other pair.  they also said that when they first saw the orbs that they appeared to be at a lower altitude then when i was outside because they were larger in size.  they said that as they were "dancing", all four were moving away at the same slow and steady speed until the altitude that they rested at when i stepped outside.  my one friend said that when he first saw it, he thought that someone let something into the sky that might have had a flame attached.  he said that it was when the "dancing" started, that he knew that it was definitely something else.  he said that with the flight pattern that they were demonstrating that there was no way it was just an object floating through the wind.  he said it was too precise and beyond anything "normal" that he could imagine.

i am a skeptical person by nature; however, my personal belief regarding extraterrestrial life is that we would be small-minding to think that we are the only beings in existence.  all i know is that what i was looking at was certainly not a plane, nor a helicopter.  i would say that the size of the orb when i saw it was approx. three times the size of the north star.  i would have to say i was excited to witness the phenomenon for the mere potential that it could be a once in a life time sighting, whatever it may be.
content.summary: Four pulsing orange orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked to the beach and decided to take a picture of the ocean with my cell phone camera. since the water looks more beautiful when viewed through my polarized sunglasses i decided to take two pictures. one through the lense of my sunglasses and one without. 

in the picture i took through the sunglasses you can see the blip in the background. the pictures were taken seconds apart. i didn't notice the blip until i reviewed the pictures on my computer when i got home.
content.summary: Didn't see it until i reviewed pictures.
